headline: Should Analyst Optimism on Tech and Global Deals Prompt Action From Deere (DE) Investors?
summary: In November 2025, Deere & Company received upbeat analyst commentaries from UBS and RBC Capital, both forecasting robust long-term earnings growth and citing strengthened international trade relationships, such as new machinery deals and China’s pledge to buy U.S. soybeans. RBC’s initiation of coverage and emphasis on Deere’s global leadership, growing technology investments, and construction segment momentum highlight investor confidence, even as analysts acknowledge near-term industry...
